EditTextPreference.android:title: Custom Response
EditTextPreference.android:summary: This is the message that your recipient will receive when TextSecretary replies for you.
EditTextPreference.android:defaultValue: Sorry, I'm busy at the moment. I'll get back to you as soon as possible.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Start Service on Boot
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Automatically start Text Secretary when you power on your device.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Calendar Integration
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Only auto responds if you are currently in an event. In your Custom Response above, you can enter [end] to have the end time of your event inserted. Similarly, enter [name] to have the name of the your event inserted.
A notification will be displayed for every auto-reply Text Secretary sends.

CheckBoxPreference.android:title: Sleep Timer
CheckBoxPreference.android:summary: Enables a minimum time between responses to a single contact to avoid spamming the recipient.

ListPreference.android:title: Sleep Length
ListPreference.android:summary: Customize the minimum length of time between responses.
